friendler.name: Alpaca
friendler.description: This alpaca has the ability to conduct electricity and use it!

friendler.name: Captain
friendler.description: If you never thought that there is something in this world that has the same large appetite as you, you're wrong.

friendler.name: Chao
friendler.description: Don't be fooled by its cuteness because it has the ability to control water.

friendler.name: Chocobo
friendler.description: You ever thought about how it is like to fly without having to use an airplane? This bird can fulfill those dreams.

friendler.name: Corgi
friendler.description: This dog is a master of backflips.

friendler.name: Arty
friendler.description: Thinking about drawing or painting a masterpiece in the near future or all the time? This slime will be your buddy and helping hand.

friendler.name: Zangy
friendler.description: Though it doesn't have any arms or legs, don't be fooled because this slime is a karate master.

friendler.name: Okami
friendler.description: If you ever need something to protect you from danger, then this wolf is a safe bet.

friendler.name: Yoshi
friendler.description: This baby dinosaur loves to eat fruit and vegetables. Once it grows bigger, you will be able to ride it for transportation.
